[tex] | = . {?}^{?} | [/tex]

I recently moved to another town. I was very anxious on the first day I didn't know anyone. I went to the classroom and entered the room. While I was entering the room, I felt that everybody's eyes were on me I became even more anxious then. Fortunately, Mrs. Dian, the civic teacher, was right behind me. She greeted me and introduced me to the class. It turned out that my classmates were friendly. They showed me around and helped me get to know the school. At the end of the day, I was less and less anxious. I will always remember my first day at my school. Posted by Rafi

related_questions.question: Diketahui sebuah kubus dengan volume 9.261 cm2. Jumlah panjang seluruh rusuh kubus adalah

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

21 cm

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

Volume = rusuk × rusuk × rusuk

Maka panjang rusuk kubus:

[tex] \sqrt[3]{9.261} = 21[/tex]

Bukti:

V = 21 × 21 × 21

= 441 × 21

= 9.261

Jawaban:

Rumus Volume kubus

Volume = r × r × r

Maka

[tex] \sqrt[3]{9.261} \\ = 21[/tex]

panjang seluruh rusuh kubus adalah ...... ?

Jawab :

Volume = 21 × 21 × 21

= 9.261 cm

Kesimpulan Jumlah panjang seluruh rusuh kubus adalah 21 cm

Detail Jawaban

Mapel : Matematika

Kelas : V

Kata kunci : panjang seluruh rusuh kubus

tentukan panjang sisi AC!

sin 30⁰ = depan/miring

sin 30⁰ = AB/AC

1/2 = 4/AC

2 . 4 = 1 . AC

8 = 1 AC

AC = 8/1

AC = 8 cm

panjang AC adalah 8 cm

related_questions.question: beni berlatih sepak bola pukul 09.00 dan selesai berlatih pukul 18.00 berapa menit kah beni berlatih sepak bola ​

answers.answer:
Jawab:

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

Lama berlatih=18.00-09.00 =9 jam

=9x60 menit= 540 menit

Jawaban:

540 menit

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

1 jam = 60 menit

60 × 9 = 540 menit

perbandingan ruas

vektor

soal 1a

koordinat P  

CP : CD = 2 : 4

CP : CD =  1 : 2

2 CP = 1 CD

2(p - c) = 1 (d- c)

2p - 2c = d - c

2p = d -  c + 2c

2p = d  + c

2p = (- 2, 20 , -22) + (4, 8, 2)

2p = (2, 28 , -20)

P =  (1, 14, -10)

soal 2a

diketahui  R(5, 7, 2 )  dan T (-3,- 1, 6)

tentukan koordinat titik S

a. RS : ST = 1 : 3

3 RS = 1 (ST)

3 (s -r) = 1(t - s)

3s- 3r = t - s

3s + s = 3r + t

4s= 3r + t

s = 1/4 ( 3r +  t)

[tex]\sf S = \frac{1}{4} \left[\begin{array}{ccc}3\left(\begin{array}{ccc}5\\7\\2\end{array}\right) + \left(\begin{array}{ccc}-3\\-1\\6\end{array}\right) \end{array}\right] \sf\\\\\\\sf S = \frac{1}{4} \left[\begin{array}{ccc}\left(\begin{array}{ccc}15-3\\21-1\\6+6\end{array}\right) \right) \end{array}\right] = \sf\\\\\\[/tex]

S=  1/4 (12,  20, 12) = (3 , 5, 3)

soal 2b

RS : ST = 7 : -2

-2 (RS) = 7 (ST)

-2 (s- r) = 7( t - s)

- 2s + 2r = 7t - 7s

-2s+ 7s = 7t - 2r

5s = 7t - 2r

5s = 7(-4, - 3, 6) -  2(1, 2 , -4)

5s = (- 28 - 2) , (-21 - 4) , (42 +8)

5S = (-30,  -25 , 50)

S =  (- 6, - 5, 10)

related_questions.question:
Diketahui Kubus PQRS.TUVW dengan panjang rusuk 8 cm. Tentukan :    a. Jarak P ke Q
b. Jarak U ke W
c. Jarak R ke T​

answers.answer:
geometri

kubus

r = 8 cm

Jarak P ke Q

= PQ = r = 8 cm

Jarak U ke W

= √(UT² + TW²)

= √(8² + 8²)

= 8√2 cm

Jarak R ke T

= √(RQ² + QP² + PT²)

= √(8² + 8² + 8²)

= 8√3 cm
